entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Melita
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:17 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Melita 9:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 103.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 70 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
